summary.label:
Has it ever happened that you have to meet someone and the person can't explain where he/she is? This app will quickly find the location of another phone by sending a text message request. Most phones manufactured after 2010 can accept this request, no need to install any additional app on the 2nd person's phone. It does not get any easier than this!

How it is working:

• User A wants to know a User B location.

• User A enters the phone number of User B into the app.

• The app generates a unique URL, and the URL is sent to User B.

• If User B clicks on the link, user A will see the location of user B.

Limitations:

• This is not a spy app. User B must agree to share the location with you.

• If User B has a device without GPS (desktop computer, tablet), the determined location may have a large accuracy margin (up to 5 km).

• In rare situations, when user B is behind the corporate proxy, the app can show the proxy's location, not the user's.

The user location is determined in three ways:

• E.123, E.164
• RIR
• W3C Geolocation API

Met die druk van ’n knoppie kan jy diensverskaffers waarsku, wat jou so gou moontlik sal bereik om jou en jou afhanklikes by ’n presiese GPS-bepaalde posisie met sorg te ondersteun – selfs al kan jy nie praat nie of nie weet waar jy is nie. Direkte waarskuwings beteken vinniger reaksietye en die intydse deurstuur van inligting aan reaksiepersoneel sodat jy weet dat hulp op pad is.]  
Brei jou veiligheid- en mediese netwerk aansienlik  uit. Verseker die veiligheid en welstand van jou familie: Laai die AfriForum 911-noodknoppietoep vandag nog af.  Stoor ook die AfriForum 911-noodnommer (086 111 6154) op jou slimfoon as kontak.
Die AfriForum 911-noodknoppietoep koppel jou aan ’n landwye netwerk van privaat gewapendereaksie- en mediesenoodreaksiedienste – met die druk van ’n knoppie! Onthou dat jy beskikbare data op jou slimfoon moet hê en dat jou slimfoon se liggingsaanduider aangeskakel moet wees om sommige van dié dienste te kan gebruik.
•	Ontbied een gratis gewapendereaksie- en een gratis mediesenoodreaksiediens per maand vir jou en jou direkte familielede (maksimum ses persone, wat dié voordeel deel). Let daarop dat mediese vervoerdienste en enige ander verwante mediese kostes nie deur hierdie ledevoordeel gedek word nie.
•	Sien intyds via toepkennisgewings wie op pad is om jou te kom help.
•	Skep groepe vanuit jou slimfoon se kontaklys.

•	Stuur waarskuwings aan voorafgekose familielede om hul hulp in ’n noodgeval te ontbied. Familielede kan ook namens jou waarskuwings stuur wanneer jy in nood verkeer.

Smartphone Link allows you to connect a compatible Garmin navigator and your iPhone®. Once linked, the compatible Garmin navigator uses your existing mobile data plan[1] to share information with your iPhone, including contacts, search results, favorite locations, your driving destination, and even your parking spot. With Smartphone Link, your compatible Garmin navigator can also access Garmin Live Services[2] for useful, real-time driving information. 

What Are Garmin Live Services?
 
Garmin Live Services provide the most up-to-date “live” information to your Garmin navigator using your existing mobile data plan. There’s no need for an additional data connection. Some services are included when you connect to Smartphone Link. Other services within the app are available through optional paid subscriptions offering premium content and enhanced features. To receive data relevant to your location, Garmin Live Services require your current GPS location be shared with Garmin and Garmin partners.

Included Live Services: 

• Address sharing - Send locations and online search results from your phone to your compatible Garmin navigator, and navigate there

• Garmin Live Traffic 
Avoid delays and find detours with the best-in-class real-time information. Garmin Live Traffic is updated every minute and receives more than 1,000 messages every update cycle

Save time, and take the stress out of parking. View helpful parking information, including pricing and availability trends for on-street public parking, as you approach your destination.

• Weather - View forecasts and current conditions

• Last Mile - Remembers your parking spot and shows your destination, so you can find your way on foot and back again

Premium Live Services, available for a one-time[4] purchase within the app, include:

• photoLive traffic cameras[2]
Look up live photos from over 10,000 traffic cameras to see traffic and weather conditions

Live flight tracker app: It has never been so easy to track flights! Do you just want to watch which planes are currently flying above your house or do you want to know where the flight from your friends, family or business contacts is now? Do this easily with this flight status tracker. This app allows locating and tracking flights – whether domestic or international, short or long – all this is live and free.

Using this flight radar is very simple. Search for a flight by entering the flight number or by using the flight tracking map and selecting the plane. You will then be shown various details about this plane and its current route.

Available plane details:
-aircraft type and photos
-airline and flight number
-flight origin and destination airports
-departure and arrival time
-altitude, speed and heading
-signal source and accuracy

This live flight radar app also contains an airport map. With this map you can find out the most important information about large and small airports from all over the world with just one click.

A compass is also integrated into this tracking app. This easy-to-use compass helps you to determine your own current position and thus helps you spotting planes with the flight radar map around your current location.

Flight tracking is exciting for several reasons. As an aviation fan, you can track flights just with one free flight radar app from your smartphone or tablet. You get more information about the current flight status than at the airport. If your friends or family are on a plane, you can easily track their flight online in real time. The practical thing is that this easy flight tracker app helps you get to the airport in time should a flight landed earlier or be delayed.

Are you wondering how it is possible that all this information appears live on your smartphone or tablet? Most modern aircraft have an ADS-B (Automatic Dependent Surveillance Broadcast) transponder installed. This transponder then transmits the air traffic information to a network of ground stations around the world, so that you can see the exact current flight position and details about the aircraft.
